hero.searchPlaceholder: Search by location, property type, or keywords...

propertyList.noPropertiesDescription: No properties match your current criteria. Try adjusting your filters or searching a different area.

countryContext.canExpand: You can expand your search to other countries using the filters

city.title: No properties found in {{city}}
city.message: Try expanding your search area or adjusting your filters to find more properties

spatial.title: Find Properties Near You

instructions.clickMap: Click on the map to set a search location
instructions.adjustRadius: Adjust the radius slider to expand or narrow your search
instructions.searchButton: Use the search button to find properties in that area
instructions.enterAddress: Enter an address or use your current location

spatial.noPropertiesFound: No properties found in this area. Try expanding your search radius or selecting a different location.
spatial.initialInstructions: Select a location and search radius, then click "Search Properties" to find real estate in that area.

voiceSearch.title: Voice Search
voiceSearch.clickToStart: Click the microphone to start voice search

exampleCommands.houses: 'Show me houses for sale in Paris with 3 bedrooms'
exampleCommands.villas: 'Villas near the beach with a pool'

voiceSearch.noResults: Sorry, I didn't catch that. Please try again.
voiceSearch.searching: Searching based on your voice input...

chatbot.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your property matching assistant. Tell me about your ideal property, and I'll help you find it.
chatbot.title: Property Matching Assistant
chatbot.subtitle: Describe your dream property, and I'll find matches for you.
chatbot.inputPlaceholder: Type your preferences here (e.g., 'a 3-bedroom house in London with a garden')...
chatbot.error: Sorry, I encountered an issue. Please try again.
chatbot.foundProperties_one: Okay, I found {{count}} property that might interest you!
chatbot.foundProperties_other: Okay, I found {{count}} properties that might interest you!
chatbot.noProperties: I couldn't find any properties matching that exact description. Would you like to try broadening your search?
chatbot.needMoreInfo: I need a bit more information to find properties. Could you tell me more about what you're looking for?
chatbot.searchError: There was an error while searching for properties. Please try again.
chatbot.startConversationPlaceholder: Start a conversation above to find properties matching your criteria.
chatbot.examplePromptsPlaceholder: e.g., 'Show me 2-bedroom flats near the city centre' or 'I'm looking for a family home with a large garden'.
chatbot.searchingPropertiesStatus: Searching for properties based on our conversation...

wizard.title: Property Wizard
wizard.description: Step-by-step guide to add your property

errors.locationRequiredDesc: Please select at least one location to continue.

aiRecommendations.title: AI Property Recommendations
aiRecommendations.description: These properties are personalised based on your preferences and behaviour.
aiRecommendations.personalisedForYouDesc: Based on your selected interests and activity.
aiRecommendations.similarDesc: Properties similar to ones you've viewed

toast.selectInterestDesc: Select at least one interest to personalise your recommendations
toast.moreLikeThis: We'll show you more like this
toast.lessLikeThis: We'll show you less like this
